subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The African Cup of Nations being staged Jan. 20-Feb. 10 in Ghana will whisk away some of the top players in the English Premier League and other leagues for a month or more.
snippet: The African Cup of Nations being staged Jan. 20-Feb. 10 in Ghana will whisk away some of the top players in the English Premier League and other leagues for a month or more.
